decision_conditions: The extent of changes to the scheme would go beyond the scope of a non-material minor amendment and incorporate matters which require further consideration. The changes to the internal layout would in the opinion of officers materially change the approved scheme and the amenity of future occupants and surrounding occupiers would require full assessment. Furthermore, the plans submitted are suggestive of alterations to the front elevation and roof accommodation/dormer. There is a reasonable expectation that neighbouring properties would be consulted on such matters. As such the alterations shown as a whole cannot be considered as non-material and require a fresh application for planning permission (or S73 application).
Drawing nos. PL-000, PL-01, PL-02, PL-03.
description:
Application for a non-material amendment to planning permission Ref: P0145.20 dated 06/04/2020 to allow for internal alterations. 
(Conversion and extension of existing dwelling to create 4 x 1 bedroom flats, including the infilling of the existing open carport to make habitable, reconfiguration and enlargement of the existing rear extensions and a loft conversion with rear dormer window.)
